ygData.subject: Re: Lv30 Bard Song
ygData.msgSnippet: Not finished it. Anyone know how tough that hermit is? Been asking people but no one seems to know. I don t want to bug someone I don t know to go there to
ygData.messageBody:
Not finished it. Anyone know how tough that hermit is? Been asking people
but no one seems to know. I don't want to bug someone I don't know to go
there to /con him, so I'm stuck with the memory of a lvl 16 guy I was with
once saying the hermit /conned red to him.
Speaking of that general area, what's up with Guard McCluskey? I want to
kill him, just cuz. Anybody done it? I think I might've missed a crucial
moment the other day when I was wandering and passed through that those
houses near the canyon to Qeynos hills (where that Misty lady hangs out all
day) and I saw McCluskey walking away from Misty.
Now, whether they exchanged words or not I don't know, and it's probably
wishful thinking on my part (The most impressive (and I say that dubiously)
display of AI I've seen was when the Brothers near there used to flame the
crap out of each other once in a while) but it could be cool to find out
more about those folks in such a way eh?


-----Original Message-----
From: Dennis Crews [SMTP:dcrews@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 13, 1999 6:07 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Lv30 Bard Song

From: Dennis Crews <dcrews@...>

Just thought of this...

Possible *SPOILER* for some:


Has anyone completed the quest from Valen Nostrolo in South Karana? He was
completing a song and needed two pages. It is possible that the reward
could be
one of the missing songs. I am not high enough level to complete the quest
yet,
so don't know what you get.

Just a thought...
